channel.title: Uday on Uday | Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Uday on Uday | Portfolio

item.title: How I Built an AI System That Understood ONDC Taxonomy
item.description: A deep dive into the technical challenges and solutions for creating a retrieval-augmented generation system that can understand and navigate complex product taxonomies.

item.title: AI Tools Fail When You Forget the Human Layer
item.description: Reflections on why the most successful AI applications are those that thoughtfully integrate human expertise and workflow rather than trying to replace it entirely.

item.title: RAG-based Catalog System for ONDC
item.description: Built a retrieval-augmented generation system that understands complex product taxonomies and delivers instant, accurate results for e-commerce catalog management.

item.title: Product is Applied Systems Design
item.description: An exploration of how systems thinking principles can transform product development and lead to more resilient, adaptable solutions.

item.title: AI Research Agent for Medical ML
item.description: Created an intelligent agent that helps doctors and researchers automatically generate, test, and validate machine learning pipelines for their specific research needs.

item.title: Modular AI Platform with Supabase & Hugging Face
item.description: Developed a flexible, modular platform that combines the power of modern LLMs with robust backend infrastructure, enabling rapid prototyping and deployment of AI applications.
